What are the most interesting news stories today

Here are some interesting news stories making headlines today:

1. **House GOP Pulls Budget Resolution** - The House Republican leaders have decided to pull a budget resolution, indicating that they do not have enough votes to proceed. This development could have significant implications for their legislative agenda. [Read more here.](https://thehill.com/homenews/house/5164168-house-gop-leaders-pull-budget-resolution/)

2. **Newly Discovered Asteroid Will Bypass Earth** - A newly discovered asteroid has been confirmed to pass by Earth without any risk of impact. This finding is part of ongoing efforts to monitor near-Earth objects. [Learn more about it here.](https://www.voanews.com/a/newly-discovered-asteroid-will-bypass-earth-/7988316.html)

If you’d like more information on any of these stories or other topics, feel free to ask!
The current date is February 26, 2025. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!
